mapper.select: SELECT ID, RATING, PRIVACY, EMAIL, NICKNAME, INTRO, PROFILEIMG FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{memberId}

SELECT M.ID AS "id", M.NICKNAME AS "nickName", M.EMAIL AS "email", M.RATING AS "rating", M.INTRO AS "intro", M.PROFILEIMG AS "profileImg" FROM FOLLOWS F INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON F.FOLLOW_ID = M.ID WHERE F.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT NVL(MONTHLY_ACHIEVEMENT_RATE,0) AS "MONTHLY_ACHIEVEMENT_RATE", NVL(MONTHLY_ACHIEVEMENT_COUNT,0) AS "MONTHLY_ACHIEVEMENT_COUNT" FROM STATS WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT ROUND(AVG(S.MONTHLY_ACHIEVEMENT_RATE),2) AS "FOLLOW_ACHIEVEMENT_RATE", ROUND(AVG(S.MONTHLY_ACHIEVEMENT_COUNT),2) AS "FOLLOW_ACHIEVEMENT_COUNT" FROM FOLLOWS F INNER JOIN STATS S ON F.FOLLOW_ID = S.MEMBER_ID WHERE F.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
select count(*) as today from todos tod left join categories c on tod.categories_id = c.id where to_char(t_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-dd') and member_id = #{memberId}

select count(*) as complete from todos tod left join categories c on tod.categories_id = c.id where to_char(t_date,'YYYY-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-dd') and member_id = #{memberId} and status = 1

SELECT M.EMAIL, M.NICKNAME, M.PROFILEIMG, M.RATING, S.TOTAL_ACHIEVEMENT_COUNT, S.MEMBER_ID FROM STATS S RIGHT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.ID = S.MEMBER_ID ORDER BY S.TOTAL_ACHIEVEMENT_COUNT DESC NULLS LAST, M.CREATEAT ASC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
